description: The command to update the Kinesis stream destination.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The table name for the Kinesis streaming destination input. You can also provide the ARN of the table in this parameter.

parameters.name: StreamArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Kinesis stream input.

parameters.name: UpdateKinesisStreamingConfiguration
parameters.description: The command to update the Kinesis stream configuration. ApproximateCreationDateTimePrecision (string) --- Enables updating the precision of Kinesis data stream timestamp.

nested_params.name: ApproximateCreationDateTimePrecision
nested_params.description: Enables updating the precision of Kinesis data stream timestamp.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The table name for the Kinesis streaming destination output.

nested_items.name: StreamArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the Kinesis stream input.

nested_items.name: DestinationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the attempt to update the Kinesis streaming destination output.

nested_items.name: UpdateKinesisStreamingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The command to update the Kinesis streaming destination configuration.

nested_items.name: ApproximateCreationDateTimePrecision
nested_items.description: Enables updating the precision of Kinesis data stream timestamp.
